entry.title: Payment Protocol for Face-to-face Payments
entry.summary: In this context, the speaker, Andreas, is being thanked for their input on BIP standardisation. The speaker then suggests that including the VIEW intent seems like an obvious choice for standardisation. They also mention that Bluetooth support should come later, possibly after encryption/authentication has been implemented on the RFCOMM link. The suggestion for SSL as a possible encryption option is alluded to. Additionally, there is mention of an HTML attachment being scrubbed from the message.
